title: Riot Mystery Gifted Me

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Riot randomly mystery gifted me after i got done an aram and i got this profile picture does it mean anything?

replies.body: It is just the icon for doing Worlds[ Pick'Em](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#how-to-play)

As *Lew* mentioned, this was the Icon given out for participating in the [Worlds Pick'em Challenge](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#welcome)!

Let me know if you have any other questions, enjoy your icon! ^.^
